title: 89/134/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 February 1989 approving the programme relating to the cotton sector in Spain in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 389/82 (only the Spanish text is authentic
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 February 1989
approving the programme relating to the cotton sector in Spain in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 389/82
(Only the Spanish text is authentic)
(89/134/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme relating to the cotton sector forwarded by the Government of Spain of 16 May 1988, and supplemented on 15 November 1988, in accordance with Regulation (EEC) No 389/82, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 February 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1982, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 329, 20. 11.
